attributes.action: Give the brittish people a referendum on EU treaty,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair promised a referendum before joining the European constitution, but now is preparing to sign a treaty which is basically a revamp of the old constitution and has no plans to consider the view of the British public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
